name: preprocessBoroughs
author: Gianfranco Cecconi <gianfranco.cecconi@digitalcontraptionsimaginarium.co.uk>
description: The script transforms a .kml file containing all London boroughs such as the one downloadable at http://www.londonspovertyprofile.org.uk/indicators/mapkml/map.kml in one GeoJSON file per borough, ready to be used in the Leaflet GeoJSON constructor.
